tool_description: Analyzes technician workload capacity and availability to identify over/under-utilization and support balanced resource allocation decisions.

technician_ids.description: List of technician IDs to analyze

available_hours.description: Available work hours for each technician

scheduled_hours.description: Currently scheduled hours for each technician

skill_levels.description: Skill level for each technician: junior, intermediate, senior

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All technician arrays must have equal length
Invalid hours: Available and scheduled hours must be non-negative
Over-scheduled technician: Scheduled hours exceed available hours for one or more technicians
Invalid skill level: Must be one of [junior, intermediate, senior] or empty
usage: Provide technician availability and current schedule data to analyze capacity utilization and identify opportunities for workload balancing.

utilization_summary.description: Utilization data per technician in format 'id:available:scheduled:utilization%'

avg_utilization.description: Average utilization percentage across all technicians
